channel.title: Im A Freaking Noob -Compiler Help- - Solved-
channel.description:
O.K. here is my compiler's code or w/e
[code]@echo off title Compiler cd Client Files if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiling finished! pause exit[/code]
ok and when I run it I get the same old error
[code]The system cannot find the path specified.[/code]
only I already set my environmental variables and what not so could someone just give me a working compiler or tell me how to fix this.

item.title: Im A Freaking Noob -Compiler Help- - Solved-
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

Never mind I fixed it I had to edit it with this…

@echo off title Compiling Client cd Client Files echo Now Compiling "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_19\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: Im A Freaking Noob -Compiler Help- - Solved-

Answer this: What version of Java update do you have?

item.title: Im A Freaking Noob -Compiler Help- - Solved-
item.dc:creator: @rainerr rainerr
item.description:
@rainerr wrote:

@echo off
title Compiling Server
cd …/src
echo Compiling Servername now…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/build/ ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java
pause

  \/\/\/\/\/\/

at jdk1.6.0_21 - look.- program files/java and look your own version

Read full topic
